name: Taco Gordo
about: Taco Gordo a hoppin' neighborhood spot in the old ONE Beverage Redemption Center

name: May Day
about: May Day just opened up in the old Butch & Babes building. They will let you taste wine before you buy a bottle, but only if you ask.

name: Maudite Poutine
about: Maudite Poutine just opened up where Drifters used to be. They have late-night hot dogs and milk shakes.

name: Cafe Mamajuana
about: Mamajuana opened recently in the old Chubby Muffin building, which they share with Poppy Cafe and All Souls Tortilleria. That food is gooooood.

name: Poppy Cafe
about: Poppy opened recently in the old Chubby Muffin building, which they share with Cafe Mamajuana and All Souls Tortilleria. Those sandwiches are good for at least two meals.
